name: 陳怡倩
objective: Main objective of this course is threefold: (1) to provide a review of essential grammar skills to construct sentences that convey ideas effectively and clearly; (2) to compose a paragraph that has clearly stated topic sentence with adequate development and appropriate organization; (3) to identify and correct sentence structure and syntactic problems.
schedule:
W1 Course Introduction,  Adjective Clauses
W2 Noun Clauses
W3 Participial Phrases 
W4 Gerund Phrases, Infinitive Phrases
W5 Absolute Constructions
W6 Abstract Noun Phrases
W7 Appositive Phrases
W8 Mid-term
W9 Sentence Combination
W10 Writing Process & Paragraph Structure
W11 Narrating 
W12 Narrating (cont.)
W13 Describing
W14 Describing (cont.)
W15 Explaining
W16 Explaining (cont.)
W17Comparing/Contrasting
W18 Comparing/Contrasting (cont.) & Final
scorePolicy: Class activities & pop quizzes (20%); assignments (35%); mid-term (30%); final (15%).
